channel.title: ~~@@~~ if you wanna go to heaven click here ~~@@~~
channel.description:
Alright I've been coding my server for 3 days now but i can't seem to make stores , i get the NPCs in , the items in the store but when ever i right click and click trade it shuts down my client :S , any ideas what the problem is..it also points me to this(everytime it shuts down on the runserver.exe)
[code] case 17: //second Click npc NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128); NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; faceNPC(NPCSlot);[/code]
Any ideas? I'm in dire need of help :S. I've also added tons of stuff to my server like full ranged, fighter torso , defenders , working specs etc. But without making shops to utitilize it , it's almost worthless. And this is a Fr33Sc4p3 based server.
[img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/6973/errorxf2.jpg[/img]
I cut out some information that I don't want released...
[code]shop = 43 @red@Ranged_Ftw! 2 2 861 1000 859 1000 4212 100 892 1000 893 1000 2487 100 2493 100 2499 100 2489 1000 2495 100 2501 100 2491 100 2497 100 2503 100 [/code]
Thats all I've added to Shops.cfg , i don't think theres spaces but at the second line i used [b]ENTER[/b]

item.title: ~~@@~~ if you wanna go to heaven click here ~~@@~~
item.dc:creator: @Heavenly_Pk Heavenly Pk
item.description:
@Heavenly_Pk wrote:

Azn:

[quote]Simply move the shop NPCs from the bottem of AutoSpawn.cfg to the top.[/quote]

OMFG W00T it worked , but the items i wanted aren’t there… :S

Read full topic
